name: A Day in the Life (Trey1232)
description:
Get ready for your day!

Controls

WASD/Arrow Keys: Move

Escape: Reload  Game



I made this during the Global Game Jam 2021. The theme was "Lost and Found."   I interpreted that as a mad rush to get ready at the start of my day to get somewhere, where I forgot where I put my wallet,  phone and other items from the night before. 

I made all of the sounds using things around my house and my voice. I used MS Paint /GIMP to  create the base circle, square, triangle, and tiles. I combined them in Unity to  create  the various pickups.
